Name: Beulings
Review Text: One of the best meals I've ever had.  Beautiful intimate atmosphere.  A dinner that seemed to have Neverending courses.  Everything was perfect.

Name: Beulings
Review Text: I really wanted to like Beulings. It’s intimate setting, reviews and prices set high expectations. Unfortunately, the reality was less than what I expected, having experienced other fine dinning restaurants in the same price bracket. …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: We’ve had one of the most amazing and special dining experiences here. The food is delicious and beautifully presented, wine pairing is spot on, and people working here make sure you have the best evening. We’ve been to a number of …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Unbelievable experience. We went in with a plan of the 5 course and transitioned into the 7 course dinner. They also brought numerous transition plates in between the courses. The portions were just right. I also encourage the wine pairing …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic food and wine, and super nice homey atmosphere. They serve many small dishes so I advice that you come hungry! Also all the small details, such as the very beautiful serving plates and delicate wine glasses added to the …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: This place is fabulous, great service, lovely staff - amazing experience- 6 stars!! But only 5 available ;) I have decided to add tom this review because it wasnt the best review. The location was tucked away on a bacj street - as are most …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Visiting this gem now for many years! And by far this is my favourite place to go for a celebration and food experience. Lemon pie with olive ice cream, octopus, great wine and service! Perfect!

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Nice ambience and service. Anyhow the food menu needs more work to make it special. The kitchen should have a better ventilation system.

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Amazing place offering awesome food even though the covid times. Menu changes every week. Food is nicely packaged and tastes like something out of this world. We love it

Name: Beulings

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Fantastic hidden gem with great food, service and atmosphere. Wine pairing was extraordinary

Name: Beulings
Review Text: great food prepped by chefs! great teamwork to. Food is very fusion and fresh. :)

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Hidden gem, i am definitely coming back! Loved every single dish. :)

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Beulings has definitely become an amazing addition to the list of favorite restaurants for fine dining in Amsterdam. We truly enjoyed both delicious and inventive food and great and friendly staff with an outstanding attitude towards …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: The service and the food where extraordinary! Specially loved the wine pairing. Totally recommend

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Incredible meal. Intimate, warm, inviting. Staff was so kind and friendly, just attentive enough. Tasting menu was divine, unique, fresh, inspired. Local elements and complexity, everything had a purpose. Flavors danced! Best meal in Amsterdam and definitely overall in awhile.

Name: Beulings
Review Text: We’ve chosen the restaurant to celebrate an event. The wines were great! The service was great! The food, though, was too ‘modern’ from my point of view. For example, for the lamb dish I’ve expected lamb meat taste and/or flavor, but …

Name: Beulings
Review Text:
Very impressed by this marvellous and cosy place!
This young and warm-hearted team gives every Gast the feeling being at home.
Amazing quality of food, we enjoyed every bite, delicious. …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Absolutely outstanding.  This is good for people who want a nice long evening tasting amazing flavours and wines.  Dont come if you are in a rush.  This is a about enjoying life.   Staff is delightful.  Wine pairing is impressive.

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Food is good but not surprising as you should expect in a place like this. Unfortunately this wasn't the case, especially shocking was a kind of tribute to Dutch land with potatoes with clay. One of them quite dissapointing due to the lack …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Been here two times already, and I know I will be back at some point. The first time, it was a happy random recommendation from a friend, and the second was for an anniversary with my partner, not long after. …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: What a gem. Such tasty food! The wine pairing is recommended. Absolutely worth a visit. The place is smack down town in one of the many quiet little side streets. Well balanced and inventive thought out menu that keeps surprising you. Enjoy!

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Absolutely amazing restaurant and a true hidden gem in Amsterdam! 2 star quality. Reservation is a must though. Will absolutely come back. Tip: do take the wine pairing menu!

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Outstanding! Where do I begin, the food was exceptional, beautiful flavours wonderfully blended together, the chef has a clear passion and love for what he does. Each course was accompanied with a wonderful selection of wines and staff extremely knowledgable. Can't rate this place enough, this little gem is a must visit.

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Have lived in Amsterdam for a year and three months now and Beulings is our best dining experience to date! Service was excellent. Each course was presented and described with intent, not just hastily memorized and read out loud. We opted …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Amazing place. Great food, lovely people. The staff was more than happy explaining what they were keeping in all the mason jars on the walls (homemade sauces, zuurkool, and even wine and beer)

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Absolutely one of the best places 1 have ever been. Every meal was delicious and combined really well with the wines (go for the wine pairing!). Many delicious bites before and in between. Will be back for sure!

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Probably one of the best meals I have had recently including several michelin starred restaurants. The course menu was truly amazing and super tasty. I really loved everything from their home made bread to all the way to dessert. The wine …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: After you took place, the waitress tells you what's on the daily changing menu. It's possible to order single courses but it's recommended to go for the 3 up to 7 course menu. With all the amuses the 4 course is enough, unless you're very …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Excellent. Cozy place, nice tasting menu, really quite inexpensive

Name: Beulings
Review Text: 2nd time back, the rating remains 5 stars! Great, creative food. The wine pairing was fun and a bit surprising at times (in a good way). I highly recommend.

Name: Beulings
Review Text: One of the best meals I’ve ever had. The owners are warm and friendly, the service is exceptional and the ambience is cozy and inviting.

Name: Beulings
Review Text: We had a wonderful evening at Beulings, much much better in fact that at several Michelin-starred restaurants we've been to recently in New York or Paris. Beulings is the perfect definition of a hidden gem waiting to be discovered! It was …

Name: Beulings
Review Text: Wine is perfect, food hummmm so so

Name: Beulings
Review Text: The food is good, nothing special. If you don’t have any idea to spend 3-4 hours of your evening. Come here and spend it to waiting for your dish... Finaly: cost is that price? - defiantly. Cost it time to wait so long? - nope

Name: Beulings
Review Text: My second time to this hidden delight of a restaurant located just outside of the tourist spot, yet again you didn't disappoint me = great flavour combinations and the best service. Perfect wine accompanied with the dishes hence my top score, see you on my next visit - Alex
